Name: Ammo Compartment
Special_characteristic: Can hold up to 5 Type 2 ammo hardpoints of ammunition

Name: Astral Sail Upgrade +1
Special_characteristic: Adds +1 to your ship’s cruising velocity

Name: Gryphon Aviary (small)
Special_characteristic: Summon a Valkyrie Griffin Squadron. Hangar pets fight for 4 turns or until killed.

Name: Beacon Torpedo launcher
Special_characteristic: If an uncharted island is found, parties can launch a torpedo to mark its position.

Name: Cargo Hold
Special_characteristic: Allows acceptance of transport and fishing quests. Creates an additional Party inventory

Name: Clockwork Infantry Shop (small)
Special_characteristic: Summon a Clockwork Soldier Squadron, allied attackers fight for 3 turns or until killed

Name: Enchanted Hull
Special_characteristic: Absorbs 2(A) from each incoming damage source

Name: Forward Ram
Special_characteristic: Charges enemy ship, on successful attack roll, begin boarding action

Name: Grappling Ballistae
Special_characteristic: Prevents enemy from fleeing or moving to longer range for 2 turns

Name: Gun Platform
Special_characteristic: Doubles the damage output of a Type 2 Hardpoint

Name: Intermix Chamber
special_requirement: Empty Structural slot,  jets or rocket thrusters

Name: Order Commandery (small)
Special_characteristic: Summon an Order of Leo Battle Squadron

Name: Reinforced Hull
Special_characteristic: Absorbs 2(p) from each incoming damage source

Name: Repulsor field generator
Special_characteristic: Nullify any movement penalties and roll for fair escape.

Name: Skyfish Net Launcher
Special_characteristic: Allows the heroes to Catch skyfish when they encounter a shoal. Each equipped net launcher can fill one small cargo hold with fish.

Name: Tesla Collector +1
Special_characteristic: adds +1 to your ship’s fuel capacity

Special_characteristic: Armor Boost +1, Activating an Aegis Altar Generates an energy shield around the ship for 1 turn.(stacking, Max +5)
